WorkItem.Description: You guys should really look at implementing this as a opt in feature of the box. The current behavior is no good when you want to open another window when the selection changes. http://www.jeff.wilcox.name/2009/01/acb-selecteditem-on-commit-only/
WorkItem.Summary: AutoCompleteBox SelectedItem changes on arrow down.

Comments.Message:
Hello
This is a performance killer. We have Business-Logic behind the setter and for each typed key
the Business-Logic is called... therefore, the GUI with AutoCompleteBox is bumpy.

Please change the impact, because it makes the AutoCompleteBox unusable for bigger lists
with business logic behind.

Thanks a lot & kind regards,
Thomas

Just a small comment: 
the problem happens on key up/down, but also on each pressed alphanumeric key, 
because AutoCompleteBox tries to find a matching item and then sets the selected item.
As the user continues typing, AutoCompleteBox always updates the selected item.

Agreed, this is one of the issues with the AutoCompleteBox that I've encountered. One workaround to this is to subclass the control and use a custom template which sets up a custom SelectionAdapter. But really, this should be a flag which could be set on the stock AutoCompleteBox.
